report.title: Verified herts records
report.description: Notifications for verified records on Herts Flora.
report.query: SELECT o.survey_title, o.website_id, o.id as occurrence_id, o.date_start, o.date_end, o.date_type, o.taxon, o.public_entered_sref, o.location_name, oi.path, CASE o.record_status WHEN 'C' THEN 'Data Entry Complete' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Verified' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'I' THEN 'In Progress' WHEN 'T' THEN 'Test' ELSE '' END AS record_status, o.verifier as verified_by FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN occurrences o2 on o2.id=o.id LEFT JOIN occurrence_images oi ON oi.occurrence_id=o.id WHERE o.survey_id = '#survey#' AND o2.verified_on > '#date#' AND o.record_status NOT IN ('I','T') #order_by#

param.name: survey
param.description: Select the survey to return data for
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
